sentence.text: The aim this study was to investigate the prevalence of single nucleotide polymorphisms in angiogenesis gene (LEP 3'UTR A/C, -2548 G/A) and LEPR (K109R and Q223R) and their association with Leptin level and obesity.
The K109R polymorphism was associated with obesity (P = .025) and seems to significantly decrease the angiogenesis levels (P < .001).
